movies.title: This is the End
movies.summary: Apocalyptic comedy about a group of actors facing the end of the world while attending a party.

movies.title: 47 Ronin
movies.summary: A group of samurai seeks vengeance against a treacherous warlord.

movies.title: The Italian Job
movies.summary: A team of thieves plans a heist to steal gold from a former associate who betrayed them.

movies.title: The Highwaymen
movies.summary: Based on the true story of two lawmen who track down notorious criminals Bonnie and Clyde.

movies.title: The Irishman
movies.summary: A mob hitman reflects on his career and involvement with the Bufalino crime family.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.summary: A group of criminals suspects a police informant among them during a heist.

movies.title: Rush Hour
movies.summary: A Hong Kong police officer teams up with a fast-talking LAPD detective to rescue a diplomat's kidnapped daughter.

movies.title: Ted
movies.summary: A man's childhood teddy bear comes to life and continues to be his best friend in adulthood.

movies.title: Scream
movies.summary: A masked killer terrorizes a small town, targeting high school students.

movies.title: Blazing Saddles
movies.summary: A comedy spoofing the Western film genre, set in a fictional Old West town.
